pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Letters on the Marconi Memorial Medal
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Letters about the formation of the Committee on Award of the Marconi Memorial Medal. The medal was to have been awarded annually for contributions to radio and David Sarnoff had been chosen as the first recipient but the Committee was dissolved as a result of a disagreement with the policies of the Italian government and the medal was never awarded.
